task.title: Use float to create a homepage
task.shortdesc: Create a homepage with a header, footer, left content and main content.

taskbody.prereq: You will need an HTML code linked to a CSS file.

step.cmd: Within your HTML code, create the following div classes:

ul.li: header (insert before h1 element and within h1 element)
left (insert before he first p element)

step.cmd: Within your CSS code, set the desired value for the following properties for the classes:

ul.li: div.header, div.footer - padding, color, background-color, clear
